threads.author: alynne
threads.content: actually that video does point out some of the model differences i guess -- the bluetooth models seem to be their upsell for more expensive parts (gyro imu, hall sticks) so i guess they leave the public bluetooth mode off on the 'cheaper' models since that's a clearer marketing difference than internal parts

threads.author: alynne
threads.content: but generally 8bd seem to be in a race with themselves over time to offer all the premium features in their budget models anyway.

threads.content: ||all of their 2.4g models have undocumented bluetooth support for diagonstics anyway lol||
